The Portions Condemning Favorite Indulgences. --There are some professed believers who accept certain portions of the testimonies as the message of God, while they reject those portions which condemn their favorite indulgences. Such persons are working contrary to their own welfare and the welfare of the 
                                                                           81
church. It is essential that we walk in the light while we have the light.--Manuscript 71, 1908.
